what_you_do: Brian Baird is the Founder/Creator of The Effective Way™, a business consulting firm focused on helping businesses operate as 'heart-based businesses' to earn more money, retain clients and team members, and grow with greater ease.
who_you_serve: Businesses intent on being their best, particularly those wanting to operate as heart-based businesses.
social_proof: BNI member (BNI Referral Masters chapter, Sugarloaf, NY); featured on the 'Find Your Leadership Confidence' podcast.
signature_programs: The Effective Way™, Doing Business at the Speed of Heart™, Be You to Be Free™, Infinite Business Results™
business_focus: Guiding businesses to grow and thrive through heart-based principles and values-driven strategies.
service_provided: business consulting, leadership coaching, heart-based business development
